enGB: Firebolt

You cause a bolt of fire to strike the target with a successful ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d3{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g}

You cause a bolt of fire to strike the target with a successful ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d3{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g}, plus another die per two caster levels past first (maximum 6d3).
Burning Touch
You sheath your hand in fire and make a touch attack against the target. The {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d3{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g}
